dtliExcerpt: This sweet-natured musical about obsolete helper robots finding love and purpose manages to be both genuinely touching and theatrically inventive, even if it doesn't quite achieve the transcendent magic it's reaching for.
showScoreExcerpt: This sweet-natured musical about obsolete helper robots finding love and purpose manages to be both genuinely touching and theatrically inventive, even if it doesn't quite achieve the transcendent magic it's reaching for.
